subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brian Schneider, the Mets’ new starting catcher, has left the Washington Nationals, the only franchise he has ever known, for the privilege of catching Johan Santana and Pedro Martínez.
snippet: Brian Schneider, the Mets’ new starting catcher, has left the Washington Nationals, the only franchise he has ever known, for the privilege of catching Johan Santana and Pedro Martínez.
